participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and outgoing, Emily enjoys sharing her passions with others and is very sociable.
participant_1.background: i take dance lessons once a week. i love new kids on the block. i was born in the early 80 s. i also like old school hip hop. my favorite toy as a child as my lite brite.

participant_2.name: Rahul
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic and playful, Rahul is full of energy and loves to engage with others through music and activities.
participant_2.background: i am a swim coach at my local pool. my mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited. my family and i are from india. my favorite music genre is death metal. i am studying to be a computer programmer.

content.text: hello, how are you? I am a child. I love hip hop
I am great thanks . Hope you are good too !
I hope so. I am in a early 80. I love it. you?
oh, I am sorry to hear that. do you have any hobbies? I like hip hop
I like to dance. I take care of my kids. you?
oh, that sounds like a lot of fun. do you dance?
do you like kids? I have a lite brite. I love them. you?
